pages.text: The $(item)Water Tablet$(0), a $(thing)legendary item, $(0)said to grant it's wearer the power to run over water. $(br2)While any records of its creation have been lost, there may still be one, somewhere in the world

Records speak of the transport of this relic via $(thing)ship$(0), others indicate sighting in $(thing)underwater ruins$(0).$(br2)The occasional $(thing)master liberian$(0) has been spotted, running over water with one.$(br)But that will surely $(thing)cost$(0) a hefty sum, if one hopes to get one for themselves
